item.title: MyProject code update
item.description:
code update by DC :
Developed a much better way to configure this plugin. See the overview page Howto section. Removed the need for Dispatcher. So this plugin has no dependencies and can be easily applied to any site using 0.8 release or newer.

item.title: MyProject code update
item.description:
code update by DC :
Update "content-anakia-link.ft" and instructions to use recent development of Dispatcher. Add a sample link.

item.title: MyProject code update
item.description:
code update by DC :
Fine-tune the output xdoc format. Use section/title and section/section.
